Rebuilding the middle class starts with families.

The Strong Start Act gives parents $3,000 when their baby is born and sets every child up with a $1,000 bond that will grow over their lifetime that they can cash in when they’re 18. It’s about helping families stay afloat early https://t.co/DHfUpIqo4W
